div.div: A girl with rough life circumstances makes a life-altering decision for the worst. In this tainted world, I shall live with the Original Sin of Purity...

Konohoshi Umika is a high-schooler who is very bad at communicating with others. Feeling almost like an alien trapped on Earth with nowhere to belong, one day she meets a girl who claims to be an actual alien! Note: Nominated for the Tsugimanga 2021 Award in the Print Manga Category.
